charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant shall serve a two 2-month term of intermittent confinement to be served in two 30-day terms. The first 30-day term shall commence on August 29, 2014. The second 30-day term shall commence after the Defendant has been assessed for eligibility in the Salvation Army's Lighthouse Recovery Center inpatient program. The Defendant shall apply for acceptance into and successfully complete a six (6) month term of community confinement at the Salvation Army's Lighthouse Recovery Center inpatient program. The Defendant shall comply with all rules and regulations imposed as part of the drug rehabilitation program at the Lighthouse Recovery Center and a probation term of 3 years; ordered to pay restitution in the amount of 188.09; and a special assessment fee in the amount of 70.00 - 2/20/2015; Defendant committed to the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 6 months with credit for time served, and to run consecutively with CR-14-00051. Upon release from imprisonment, defendant is placed on supervised release for a term of 1 year supervised release to run concurrent with CR-14-00051.
